description: Download now to get access to Shazam! Movie Level Pack 2! Control your favorite characters based on the Shazam! film. Play as Pedro Shazam and Eugene Shazam to help Billy Batson fight against the evil Dr. Sivana and his 7 Deadly Sins! Level Pack 2 includes Shazam, Pedro Shazam, Eugene Shazam, Dr. Sivana and more.
name: LEGO® DC Super-Villains Shazam! Movie Level Pack 2
